TopicTitle: No Pods available in VAB 0.90 x64

Articles.Content: As you can see in the picture, there are no pods available in the VAB running 0.90 64 bit version. When I first enter the VAB, I can not move around the VAB until I choose a pod (which does show up at first but without a tab on the left). After I choose a pod I can then move around the VAB but if I delete my pod I can not choose another pod because there is no tab on the left available to choose another one. Any help?
Use x32, x64 is completely broken now.
